data.name: Happy's Humble Burger Farm: Departing Flight (OST)
data.detailed_description: Hit the skies with Departing Flight, a prog rock meets LoFi hip hop album, itself the spiritual sequel to Landing Gear, the album of LoFi hip hop grooves that helped define Happy’s Humble Burger Barn!
data.about_the_game: Hit the skies with Departing Flight, a prog rock meets LoFi hip hop album, itself the spiritual sequel to Landing Gear, the album of LoFi hip hop grooves that helped define Happy’s Humble Burger Barn!
data.short_description: Hit the skies with Departing Flight, a prog rock meets LoFi hip hop album, itself the spiritual sequel to Landing Gear, the album of LoFi hip hop grooves that helped define Happy’s Humble Burger Barn!
